    <body>
      <h1>UpdateServices</h1>
      <h2 class="sub">Updating, Reimagined</h2>
      <p>Hey! Looks like this is the first time you're running UpdateServices. <br>First of all, welcome and thanks for downloading! </p>
      <p>UpdateServices assists in updating shortcuts powered by the UpdateKit API.</p>
 
    <h2>Ready for Developers!</h2>
    <p>UpdateServices supports shortcut signed versions. Need to force an update on a old version of the shortcut? Just change a single value on Pastebin (or another pasting service) from <code>true</code> to <code>false</code>. It couldn't be easier.<p>
 
    <h2>Ready to Start?</h2>
    <p>When you are ready, tap <b>Done</b> and start updating with UpdateServices.</p>
    </body>
